overview: Robert is the CTO and Co-Founder of a stealth start up called Open Preferences. Before Open Preferences Robert spent 4 years as a consultant for McKinsey & Company, where he advised Fortune 500 clients in the high-tech industry on operations, innovation and product development topics. Prior to that, Robert was co-founder, president and CTO of Point Cloud, an Internet technology company that provided interactive product visualization and personal photo enhancement to online retailers including ShopNBC, Orvis, and mySimon. Robert holds a Ph.D. in computer science and engineering. He has as invented and commercialized multiple Internet software technologies and has authored 7 patents.
